block.p: BASEBALL American League TORONTO BLUE JAYS--Fired Jim Fregosi, manager. Signed Gord Ash, president, baseball operations and general manager to a three-year contract. National League HOUSTON ASTROS--Promoted special assignment scout Tom Wiedenbauer to director of minor league instruction and baseball operations assistant David Gottfried to director of minor league administration.
BASKETBALL National Basketball Association LOS ANGELES LAKERS--Released F Nate Johnson. MIAMI HEAT--Released C Ike Nwankwo and F Mario Bennett.

FOOTBALL National Football League ATLANTA FALCONS--Placed T Michael Thompson on injured reserve. Re-signed OT Evan Pilgrim. CHICAGO BEARS--Placed TE-FB John Allred on the injured reserve list. Re-signed TE-FB Scott Dragos. GREEN BAY PACKERS--Signed DE Kabeer Gbaja-Biamila from the practice squad. Waived DT Chuck Osborne. MIAMI DOLPHINS--Signed WR Brian Alford to the practice squad. Released TE Rodrick Monroe from the practice squad. NEW ORLEANS SAINTS--Signed WR Charlie Jones to a one-year contract. Waived CB Todd Franz. PHILADELPHIA FLYERS--Placed RB Duce Staley on injured reserve. Signed RB Amp Lee to a one-year contract. PITTSBURGH STEELERS--Announced the retirement of OL Chris Conrad. SAN DIEGO CHARGERS--Released QB Kevin Daft from the practice squad. WASHINGTON REDSKINS--Signed K Kris Heppner to a one-year contract.

HOCKEY National Hockey League BUFFALO SABRES-- Assigned G Peter Skudra to Rochester of the AHL. Waived D Jason Holland. CHICAGO BLACKHAWKS--Re-signed LW Kris King. DETROIT RED WINGS--Activated C Steve Yzerman from the disabled list. Announced the retirement of RW Joe Kocur and named him video coordinator. PITTSBURGH PENGUINS--Recalled G Garth Snow from Wilkes-Barre-Scranton of the AHL. TAMPA BAY LIGHTNING--Reassigned G Evgeny Konstantinov to Detroit of the IHL. WASHINGTON CAPITALS--Signed George McPhee, general manager, and Ron Wilson, coach, to contract extensions. Activated G Olaf Kolzig from the injured list. Assigned G Sebastien Charpentier to Portland of the AHL.

COLLEGE AUBURN--Announced women's junior basketball C Le'Coe Willingham will not play in the 2000-01 season. BLOOMFIELD--Named Jennifer Bukofsky assistant softball coach. KENTUCKY--Announced the resignation of George Felton, associate head coach, to become a scout for the Indiana Pacers. NEW MEXICO STATE--Named Greg Berry men's assistant basketball coach. TEMPLE--Named Kristen Foley assistant athletic director and senior women's administrator.
